subject: Speedskating
Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: The American speedskater Heather Richardson won a World Cup sprint double on Saturday, taking the 500- and 1,000-meter races at the Thialf oval in Heerenveen, the Netherlands.
snippet: The American speedskater Heather Richardson won a World Cup sprint double on Saturday, taking the 500- and 1,000-meter races at the Thialf oval in Heerenveen, the Netherlands.
